title: Fix Date of Birth field population from Quick Fill text

requirements.text: Fix the parseStructuredText function to correctly extract and populate the Date of Birth field when using Quick Fill from structured text input. The parser must recognize date of birth labels (including 'DOB', 'Date of Birth', 'Birth Date', 'Birthday') and correctly parse dates in ISO (YYYY-MM-DD), US (MM/DD/YYYY), and EU (DD/MM/YYYY) formats.

quotes: Date of birth does not populate from quick text

acceptanceCriteria: When Quick Fill text contains 'DOB: 2020-05-15', the Date of Birth field populates with '2020-05-15'
When Quick Fill text contains 'Date of Birth: 05/15/2020', the Date of Birth field populates correctly
When Quick Fill text contains 'Birthday: 15/05/2020', the Date of Birth field populates correctly
The Date of Birth field updates immediately when Quick Fill is triggered
Other fields continue to populate correctly from Quick Fill without regression

constraints: Do not modify the backend schema or main.mo
Maintain compatibility with existing date parsing logic in validation.ts
Preserve all other Quick Fill functionality for remaining fields
nonGoals: Changing the date input component UI
Adding new date formats beyond ISO, US, and EU formats
